subject: Horse Racing
Jockeys, Drivers and Trainers
Kentucky Derby
lead_paragraph: C. C. Lopez will try for his lone Grade I victory and the chance to reach his first Kentucky Derby when he rides El Kabeir in the Wood Memorial on Saturday at Aqueduct.
snippet: C. C. Lopez will try for his lone Grade I victory and the chance to reach his first Kentucky Derby when he rides El Kabeir in the Wood Memorial on Saturday at Aqueduct.
